ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] EverQuest Questions & Related News
ygData.msgSnippet: Is this the same W.K. Mahler that is in the Red Sox groups? br ----Original Message Follows---- From: "W. K. Mahler"
ygData.messageBody:
Is this the same W.K. Mahler that is in the Red Sox groups?




br><br><br>----Original Message Follows----<br>From: "W. K.
Mahler" <worldmediahost@...><br>Reply-To:
EverQuest@yahoogroups.com<br>To:
<EverQuest@yahoogroups.com><br>Subject: [EverQuest] EverQuest
Questions & Related News<br>Date: Mon, 9 May 2005 17:56:46
-0400<br><br>VI<br><br>--Rip It--<br>October 2002<br>Lyrics by William K.
Mahler<br>Music by William K. Mahler & Dan Langlias<br><br>I<br>Turned
on CNN<br>Mmm, Gettin' in tune again<br>I<br>Turned on CNN<br>911
associated<br>Who<br>Who<br>Who<br><br>It's in the back<br>In the
forefront<br>It is on my computer screen<br>It is all your dreams and
schemes<br><br>I heard you were learning<br>By your<br>Accord and
choice<br>Lord has<br>Given you a high wall<br><br>Loving<br>Rip it<br>Live
it<br>Live it out<br>Loving<br>Just live it out<br><br>Uh huh<br>Uh
huh<br><br>I am<br>Coming home<br>Sometime today<br>I am walking
alone<br>Tryin' to find my lady<br>Woman<br>Leonda<br>Someday our time will
come by<br>Someday<br>Someday<br><br>...from "W. K. Mahler" with
Dan Langlais on electric guitar. (Where is Dan,<br>The Man & The
Invisible Band nowadays?) If he escaped the confines of his<br>home
confinement set upon by his lovely wife, I hope he knows where to
find<br>me.:-)<br><br><br>Anyways, Last month, Curt Schilling, the ACE
pitcher of the Boston Redo Sox<br>was on T. V. with a Everquest II hat on.
Last night, while reading a<br>interview between EverQuest makers and CNN's
Chris Morris,*<br>http:www.m2tech.us (co author of many Sci Fi Fantasy
Books) I decided to<br>download the game 3 pack Trilogy. 1.2 GB's. It
literally sucked up almost<br>all my CPU power downloading from
Sony.<br><br>I'm asking, since PC requirements were not easily found (and I
never did<br>find them) what are the specifics for play and computer
standards?<br><br><br>Thanks,<br><br><br>WKMahler<br><br><br>William K.
Mahler, Owner<br>http://www.mahlers.com<br>World Media Host Com &
More<br><br><br><br>
